definitions.definition: A person who makes one or more purchases .
examples: Every person who steps through the door is a potential buyer , so acknowledge their presence.

definitions.definition: A person who purchases items for resale in a retail establishment.
examples: The supermarket's new buyer decided to stock a larger range of vegetarian foods.

definitions.definition: A person who purchases items consumed or used as components in the manufacture of products.

main_definition: A person who makes one or more purchases .
secondary_definitions: ( retailing ) A person who purchases items for resale in a retail establishment.
( manufacturing ) A person who purchases items consumed or used as components in the manufacture of products.
